name: RunSpeed
description:
Hey there!

Welcome to the itch.io page for RunSpeed! If you're here to play the game, the download links are down below for Windows and Mac. 

RunSpeed is a 3D speedrunning game I tried to make in 3.14 (π) days. It turned out pretty cool after 3 days, so I felt inspired to keep working on it. So, I totally finished the complete game over the next week. So, the game you see below wasn't made over the course of 3 days. But it's still cool and I would rather you guys to play the finished version with cool GUI effects and stuff. I hope you have some fun playing my game :)

- DelugeDrop

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump/Double Jump

ESC - Quit to Menu

Mouse - Look

Mousewheel - Zoom
